revision.text:
{{Infobox Berry |name = Haban |image = [[File:Haban.png]] |caption = If a large enough volume of this Berry is boiled down, its bitterness fades away. It makes a good jam. This Berry requires a lot of energy to grow, stealing away nutrients from nearby plots. |growtime = 1d 0h 0m 0s |harvest = 34 berries |replant = 0% |points = 4,000 |flavor =
*0 spicy *0 dry *10 sweet *20 bitter *0 sour }} '''Haban''' is a type of [[Berries|Berry]] that can be planted in [[Farm]]. It can be obtained by surrounding an empty plot with at least 1 [[Occa]], at least 1 [[Rindo]], at least 1 [[Passho]] and at least 1 [[Wacan]]. {| class="wikitable" |+ Growth Stages ! !! Sprout !! Taller !! Bloom !! Berry |- ! Time passed since planting | 3 hours || 6 hours || 12 hours || 1 day - 2 days |- ! Animation |
[[File:AllTreeSprout.png|50px]] ||
[[File:HabanTreeTaller.png|50px]] ||
[[File:HabanTreeBloom.png|50px]] ||
[[File:HabanTreeBerry.png|50px]] |- ! Aura (growth speed) | ||
x0.8 ||
x0.6 ||
x0.5 |} === Possible Planting Formations === You can fill your [[farm]] in following way to obtain Haban berry. {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |+ Farm |- !colspan="5"| 10 mutation spots, Occa takeover possible |- | style="width: 40px;" | [[File:Occa.png|30px]]
